trustfund:
TF026625-FINANCING OF A MANAGEMENT SPECIALIST,TF022173-PHRD 2-PRIVATIZATION PROGRAM II/PSDPS,TF020250-FRENCH CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF033632-UZBEKISTAN - AGRICULTURE,TF033290-ECA REGION - (UZBEKISTAN AND
            AZERBAIJAN) INSTITUTIONAL BLDG. TA,TF022154-PHRD 2-TELECOM REFORM PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, though the
            institutional development impact is modest. Lessons convey
            that: 1) technical assistance (TA) projects, particularly in
            countries of recent Bank experience, require ample time for
            implementation, in order to allow for an effective transfer
            of skills; 2) retaining implementation of the Family Budget
            Survey (FBS) (not until the project's second extension
            did the FBS take place) proved wrong, not only causing
            funding, and implementation delays, but had it not been
            carried out, substantial data to establish a meaningful
            profile of the Uzbekistan economy, would have been
            unavailable; 3) in retrospect, the impact of the project was
            diminished, or barely visible, because it was not linked to
            a policy operation, and therefore, achieved little leverage
            in the reform program; 4) operations with significant
            equipment financing, should particularly consider - at the
            design stage - the sustainability of project activities
            beyond the life of the project, for measures to enhance
            sustainability of equipment supply, and maintenance were not
            incorporated, neither is there any strategic approach to
            lessen the dependency on further procurement support; and,
            5) the legal TA component would have been more effective,
            had local professionals been extensively consulted,
            consequently certain legal results proved unsatisfactory to
            the Government, such as the petroleum legislation.
